title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Cook the pancetta in a pan until crispy.
Beat the eggs and mix with grated Parmesan cheese.
Combine the cooked spaghetti with the pancetta and remove from heat.
Stir in the egg and cheese mixture quickly and serve.
